messages.subject: Hello, I am new here
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all.  My name is Kim and I am unschooling 3 of my 4 boys.  My youngest is 5 so he isn t offically schooling yet.  This was my first year and I loved it.
messages.messageBody:
Hello all. My name is Kim and I am unschooling 3 of my 4 boys. My youngest
is 5 so he isn't offically schooling yet. This was my first year and I loved
it. I was wondering if anyone on this list lives near Youngstown, Ohio area?
I get my assessment tommorow and I am nervous about it because my children
did more computer work and hands on things. I now have a camera and video
camera to use so I guess this will help for next year. How does everyone
keep track for all the projects and such? Thanks so much for the answers to
these questions.
